data.comment: The match has started at VEB Arena.
Vladislav Bezborodov awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow in the half of Dinamo Moscow.
Vladislav Bezborodov signals a Dinamo Moscow throw-in in CSKA Moscow's half.
In the minute 2, In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Dinamo Moscow's Daniil Lesovoy gets in a shot but it is blocked by a CSKA Moscow defender.
Dinamo Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 6, Dinamo Moscow to take a throw-in in CSKA Moscow territory.
Can Dinamo Moscow capitalize from this throw-in deep inside CSKA Moscow's half?
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow close to the penalty box.
In the minute 7, Clinton N'Jie for Dinamo Moscow drives towards goal at VEB Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Dinamo Moscow.
Can CSKA Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dinamo Moscow's half?
In the minute 8, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can CSKA Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dinamo Moscow's half?
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow in the half of CSKA Moscow.
In the minute 13, CSKA Moscow have been awarded a corner by Vladislav Bezborodov.
Free kick for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 15, CSKA Moscow have been awarded a corner by Vladislav Bezborodov.
Vyacheslav Grulev is booked for the away team.
Free kick for CSKA Moscow in the half of Dinamo Moscow.
Attention is being given to CSKA Moscowâ€™s Vadim Karpov and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 18, CSKA Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Vladislav Bezborodov signals a CSKA Moscow throw-in in Dinamo Moscow's half.
Throw-in CSKA Moscow.
In the minute 19, Ball safe as CSKA Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow at VEB Arena.
Ball safe as Dinamo Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Vladislav Bezborodov signals a throw-in for CSKA Moscow, close to Dinamo Moscow's area.
In the minute 20, Vadim Karpov (CSKA Moscow) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Alan Dzagoev.
CSKA Moscow are coming forward and Nikola Vlasic gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 21, Goal kick for Dinamo Moscow at VEB Arena.
Free kick CSKA Moscow.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 24, CSKA Moscow advance rapidly upfield but Vladislav Bezborodov blows for offside.
Corner awarded to CSKA Moscow.
CSKA Moscow to take a throw-in in Dinamo Moscow territory.
In the minute 27, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Vladislav Bezborodov signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
Corner awarded to Dinamo Moscow.
In the minute 29, Dinamo Moscow have been awarded a corner by Vladislav Bezborodov.
CSKA Moscow to take a throw-in in Dinamo Moscow territory.
CSKA Moscow apply pressure at VEB Arena and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Ivan Oblyakov but the strike hits the bar!
In the minute 30, Nikola Vlasic (CSKA Moscow) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in Dinamo Moscow.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow at VEB Arena.
In the minute 33, Important block from the Dinamo Moscow defence as Alan Dzagoev fires in a strike for CSKA Moscow.
Nikola Vlasic of CSKA Moscow smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Free kick for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 35, At VEB Arena, Ivan Oblyakov has been yellow-carded for the home team.
CSKA Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
CSKA Moscow's Nikola Vlasic misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 37, It's a goal kick for the away team in Moscow.
Baktiyor Zaynutdinov for CSKA Moscow gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Vladislav Bezborodov awards Dinamo Moscow a goal kick.
In the minute 38, Dinamo Moscow drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Vladislav Bezborodov signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow.
Roman Evgeniev (Dinamo Moscow) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 42, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Moscow, Dinamo Moscow push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Vladislav Bezborodov awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 43, Ball goes out of play for a Dinamo Moscow goal kick.
Free kick for CSKA Moscow in the half of Dinamo Moscow.
At VEB Arena the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for CSKA Moscow at VEB Arena.
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow in the half of CSKA Moscow.
Free kick CSKA Moscow.
In the minute 45, Vladislav Bezborodov signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow.
The first-half has ended.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 47, Throw-in CSKA Moscow.
Vladislav Bezborodov blows against CSKA Moscow's Chidera Ejuke for offside.
Can CSKA Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dinamo Moscow's half?
In the minute 49, CSKA Moscow to take a throw-in in Dinamo Moscow territory.
CSKA Moscow have a goal kick.
Vladislav Bezborodov signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 51, Goal! CSKA Moscow have got their heads in front thanks to a Konstantin Kuchaev strike.
Fedor Chalov instrumental with a fine assist.
CSKA Moscow have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 53, Can CSKA Moscow capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Daniil Fomin for Dinamo Moscow has been booked by Vladislav Bezborodov and receives a first yellow card.
Goal! CSKA Moscow extend their lead to 2-0 through Chidera Ejuke.
In the minute 55, CSKA Moscow needs to be cautious. Dinamo Moscow have an attacking throw-in.
Goal! Nikola Moro pulls one back for Dinamo Moscow to make it 2-1.
Daniil Lesovoy with an assist there.
In the minute 61, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 62, Dinamo Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Nayair Tiknizyan is replacing Chidera Ejuke for the home team.
Viktor Goncharenko is making the team's third substitution at VEB Arena with Adolfo Gaich replacing Fedor Chalov.
CSKA Moscow's Nikola Vlasic is on target but unsuccessful.
In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 65, In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Goal kick for CSKA Moscow at VEB Arena.
Throw-in high up the field for CSKA Moscow in Moscow.
Dinamo Moscow make their first substitution with Charles Kabore replacing Daniil Fomin.
In the minute 66, The away team replace Clinton N'Jie with Nikolay Komlichenko.
CSKA Moscow have been awarded a corner by Vladislav Bezborodov.
In the minute 67, Great finish from Igor Diveev to give CSKA Moscow a 3-1 lead.
Ball safe as CSKA Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
CSKA Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 69, Free kick for CSKA Moscow in their own half.
Vladislav Bezborodov signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow in their own half.
Corner awarded to CSKA Moscow.
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
CSKA Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Vladislav Bezborodov awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 74, In Moscow, Dmitri Skopintsev of Dinamo Moscow is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Moscow.
Free kick for CSKA Moscow in the half of Dinamo Moscow.
In the minute 75, Roman Evgeniev (Dinamo Moscow) leaves the pitch after receiving two yellow cards.
Throw-in Dinamo Moscow.
Vladislav Bezborodov awards Dinamo Moscow a goal kick.
In the minute 78, Kristijan Bistrovic is on a sub for Nikola Vlasic for CSKA Moscow.
The away team replace Daniil Lesovoy with Roman Neustadter.
Free kick Dinamo Moscow.
In the minute 81, Can CSKA Moscow capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Dinamo Moscow's half?
CSKA Moscow's Adolfo Gaich is whistled for offside at VEB Arena.
Dinamo Moscow's Sergei Slepov breaks free at VEB Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 83, CSKA Moscow have a goal kick.
Ball safe as CSKA Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Dinamo Moscow.
In the minute 86, Dinamo Moscow have been awarded a corner by Vladislav Bezborodov.
Dinamo Moscow have been awarded a corner by Vladislav Bezborodov.
Nikola Moro of Dinamo Moscow gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 87, Ball goes out of play for a CSKA Moscow goal kick.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow in the half of Dinamo Moscow.
CSKA Moscow drives forward and Adolfo Gaich gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 89, Vladislav Bezborodov awards the home team a throw-in.
Vladislav Bezborodov signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow.
Free kick for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
At VEB Arena, CSKA Moscow are penalized for being offside.
In Moscow CSKA Moscow drive forward through Kristijan Bistrovic. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Ball goes out of play for a Dinamo Moscow goal kick.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 3-1.
